product.title: Origin Dark Brown - Day Night Blind
product.description: In dark, grey-toned brown, the origin in dark brown is a deep yet neutral blind that will match a range of dcor schemes, colour palettes, and woods. With movable strips for light and privacy, hidden controls and brackets, and a sleek and impactful design, this blind is the height of luxury. Use the dark brown as part of a neutral colour scheme, surrounding it with white, cream, or ivory walls and furniture and accessories in cocoas, mochas, and taupes.

relproducts.title: Rimini Coffee - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Think luxurious, rich, creamy cappuccino, and you've got the feel of the rimini in coffee. This is the perfect neutral shade - soft enough to fit well amongst other, richer shades, yet distinct enough to work as a colour all by itself. Nestle amongst rich browns, pale creams, and vintage golds to really make the most of this subtle hue, which makes a beautiful, sophisticated accent for a bedroom or living room window.

relproducts.title: Rimini Chocolate - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: You'll be left craving the rich luxury of dark cocoa when you see the rimini in chocolate. Think cosy nights in by a warm fire, a great movie, and the family gathered round; this is the kind of atmosphere the chocolate brings to mind. Pair up with creams, golds, and beiges for a classic yet contemporary finish. This is the perfect shade for a tranquil living room; a snug, homely bedroom; or a warm, swish home office.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Mocha Brown Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm mocha brown is a soft milk coffee shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm mocha brown roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.

relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Latte Brown Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This soft latte brown roller blind adds bold and vibrant enhancment to your room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Chocolate Brown
relproducts.description: Stirlochocolate brown plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.title: Valencia Latte Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Rich and smooth, this valencia latte vertical blind is ever so elegant. Its neutral colourway is the ideal accompaniment to other natural shades. While keeping your room looking open and light, you can adjust each louvre to let in swathes of light or simply allow a gentle glow to rich and smooth, this valencia latte vertical blind is ever so elegant.

relproducts.title: Valencia Latte Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Just when you thought your home decor was safe from your sweet tooth, you've found this gorgeous valencia latte roller blind. The creamy tone of the fabric will give your room a gorgeous, natural accent while the rich colouring will keep your room feeling snug and warm all year just when you thought your home decor was safe from your sweet tooth, you've found this gorgeous valencia latte roller blind.

relproducts.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 2438mm min drop: 250mm max drop: 2438mm fabric joins: blinds with a width and drop greater than 1730mm may be joined. relproducts.title: Turin 25mm Mocca Brown Aluminium Venetian
relproducts.description: The daylight range offers the best urban and contemporary feel that will add a character to any space. Add something different to the style of any room with their mocca blind. This blind is ideal with neutral colour schemes. relproducts.title: Turin 25mm Milk Choc Brown Aluminium Venetian
relproducts.description: Their extensive range of gloss and matt finishes in a full spectrum of colour means we are sure you will find something for you. This earthy brown venetian blind is perfect to brighten up any room in your home with a splash of colour. Product id: db-dven0366 fabric colour: milk choc brown s25041 material: aluminium headrail: co-ordinating slimline aluminium headrail - face or top fix brackets slat width: 25mm slat material: aluminium control type: cord & wand energy saving rating: er1 - lowest energy saving value - due to blind type or fabric light filtering: yes turin 25mm milk choc brown aluminium venetian in brown.

relproducts.title: Origin Basic White - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The origin in basic white is made from heavy gauge aluminium guaranteed not to sag. Its wipe-clean practicality combined with the pure white, satin look finish make this blind an attractive option that is pleasing in both looks and functionality. If it's a fresh, clean style that you're looking for, blend the basic white with an all-white colour palette that's perfect for the bathroom or kitchen.

relproducts.title: Origin Magnolia - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The queen of neutrality, the magnolia version of their origin aluminium range is a simple choice that will match almost any colour it's paired with. Its satin finish and colour-coordinated cords provide it with a streamlined look that only the best of neutrals can achieve. If you love colour-blocking and continuation, go as far as setting the magnolia amongst matching magnolia walls, resulting in a clean, aerodynamic feel in a living room, hallway, or kitchen.

relproducts.title: Origin Black - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Don't be put off by the colour black's reputation; the origin in black is much more versatile, and can be far less moody, than you might think. Paired with the right dcor, the gloss aluminium slats and coordinated fittings can look simple and sophisticated. Set the black against white walls in a modern living room and complement with bright limes or fruity oranges for a step away from monochromatic living and towards boldness and colour.

relproducts.title: Origin Brushed Silver - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The ultra-metallic brushed silver from the origin range is the height of utilitarian style. With a polished, near-matte finish, the blind's aluminium slats are sturdy and hardwearing, and easily controlled using the colour-matched cords that hang from the sides. The beauty of the brushed silver is that it can be used as part of a room's central colour scheme, or incorporated as a simple accent, in the same way as a fixture or fitting might.

relproducts.title: Origin Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Dark slate in colour, the origin grey is comprised of satin-finish, heavy gauge aluminium slats, high quality pull-cords, and a clear wand tilt, resulting in a streamlined, contemporary blind. Given that the grey shade will match a multitude of hues, this is an obvious choice for those who like to change their dcor often. Go industrial in the kitchen by pairing the grey with worn metals, rustic woods, and slate floor tiles.

relproducts.title: Origin Ultramarine - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The origin ultra marine is a stand-out blue blind, with a gloss finish on strong aluminium slats. Made from only high quality materials, from the slats right through to the pull-cords, this blind is made for durability and hardiness. Take your bathroom to the seaside by coupling with pale, icy blues and pure, bright whites; or give a plain, neutral hallway or utility room a big splash of dazzling colour, offset by whites and silvers in ornaments, frames, and fittings.

relproducts.title: Origin Matt Red - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Brilliantly bold, the origin in matt red will inject life and colour into even the dullest of rooms. The satin-finish slats are made from heavy gauge aluminium, which can be adjusted to your liking using the coordinating cords. You'll love the effect the matt red has on an all-white contemporary kitchen, where it can be beautifully complemented by silver fixtures and fittings such as taps, cupboard handles, and the like.

relproducts.title: Origin Mocha - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Creamy and rich, the satin-finish origin mocha is a luxury-lover's dream. Work the adjustable slats to your heart's content, either to let the light in or keep it out, without worrying about over-use, as this durable aluminium blind is built to last. Streamline your kitchen by taking advantage of the mocha's colour-coordinated slats, cords, and rails, and pair with deeper browns or pretty turquoises to craft a refreshing and inspiring colour scheme that your guests won't be able to resist commenting on.

relproducts.title: Origin Hunter Green - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Dark and unusual, the origin in hunter green offers a perfect satin finish on slim aluminium slats, within a matching frame, and controlled using coordinating pull-cords, making this the perfect blind for both pleasure and function. For a country aesthetic with a modern twist, work the hunter green into a warm kitchen colour scheme, complementing with terracottas, soft yellows, and creams. Or make a real statement in a contemporary living room by placing it against white walls and light-coloured woods.

relproducts.title: Origin City Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: City grey combines contemporary design with an urban aesthetic to create a unique visual that takes pride of place in any room in the home. The steely character of the grey is softened by the sleek finishing and smooth surfaces of the wooden slats to create a homely addition that will enhance any space. Origin, city grey - venetian blind city grey combines contemporary design with an urban aesthetic to create a unique visual that takes pride of place in any room in the home.

relproducts.title: Day & Night Flecked Grey
relproducts.description: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other.

relproducts.description: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. relproducts.title: Day & Night Effortless Black
relproducts.description: With its dark granite-effect fabric, the day & night brushed shadows roller blind offers superb light control as well as a unique, attractive design. The dark grey colour is versatile and can be paired in a variety of ways. Its a perfect addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

relproducts.title: Day & Night Effortless Rock
relproducts.description: With its dark granite-effect fabric, the day & night brushed shadows roller blind offers superb light control as well as a unique, attractive design. The dark grey colour is versatile and can be paired in a variety of ways. Its a perfect addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other.

relproducts.title: Origin Warm Oak - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: This time in warm oak, the origin range delivers high quality basswood slats sourced from ecologically responsible forests. The blind comes with a matching pelmet, bottom rail, and acorns for a slick and streamlined aesthetic. Add some natural style to even the most contemporary of settings by including the warm oak in an all-white bedroom, using the blind and wooden furniture to provide the only colour in the room.

relproducts.title: Origin Brown - Day Night Blind
relproducts.description: The origin brown consists of a milky coffee-toned fabric, smooth with just the faintest of textures, and similarly shaded threading through a translucent netting. Brackets and controls are hidden neatly away in the overhead rail cassette, yet are easily accessible as needed. Team the brown with a rich burnt orange for a cosy, autumnal colour scheme in a dining room or living room. Choose dark, polished furniture to complement the look, and accent with plush fabrics, such as thick wools and smooth chenilles, for warmth and charm.

relproducts.title: Origin Old Walnut - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Classically elegant, the origin in old walnut displays a dark-toned finish on the responsibly sourced basswood typical of this range. A heavy duty headrail is specially designed to hold the weight of the wood and all components are formed from high quality materials. Mix the traditional with the contemporary by including the old walnut in a modernly styled dining room, blending with pale sage walls and white trim.

relproducts.title: Origin Deluxe Warm Oak - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Light yet, true to its name, warm, the origin deluxe's warm oak has a truly natural look to it, and the coated basswood, which is ecologically sourced, is durable and high quality. This luxury edition includes coordinating ladder tapes that are used to hold and control the thick, substantial slats. Combine rustic style with contemporary chic by partnering the organic yet modern warm oak with natural slates and white painted wickers.

relproducts.title: Origin Deluxe Old Walnut - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: A traditionally coloured blind, the origin deluxe in old walnut displays a dark-medium wood with a natural, matt finish. The wooden slats hang from a matching wooden pelmet and are backed with coordinating ladder tapes, so that there is no distraction from the beauty of this piece. Embrace the inherent class of the old walnut and group it with similarly traditional colours and furnishings. For a simple yet effective style in the living room, opt for cream walls and sofas, and wooden flooring and furniture.

relproducts.title: Origin Chocolate Brown - Day Night Blind
relproducts.description: This time in milky chocolate brown, the origin range provides stylish functionality, with its streamlined rail cassette, hidden controls, and sleek, sliding strips. The fabric itself is neatly woven, offering just the gentlest of texturing. Mix the chocolate brown with sage green tones for an outdoors-in look and feel in your home office. Treat yourself to a heavy oak desk and include warming fabrics in these two contrasting shades.

relproducts.title: Day & Night Effortless Brown
relproducts.description: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other.

relproducts.title: Day & Night Effortless Latte
relproducts.description: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other.

relproducts.title: Magnum Brown - Day Night Blind
relproducts.description: A golden-hued woody shade, and with sliding translucent strips between the double-layered fabric, the magnum in brown is both attractive and functional. The overhead rail cassette hides the controls from view, making for a clean and streamlined effect. Add the brown to a forest green colour scheme, allowing the wood-look hue to complement the outdoorsy green. Include plenty of natural woods in the room and accent throughout with organic, forest and sage greens, deep browns, and understated golds for a coordinated and coherent look.

relproducts.title: Magnum Light Brown - Day Night Blind
relproducts.description: Chocolate brown threads gently interject a golden canvas in the magnum in light brown, where the translucent strips add texture and style as well as versatile practicality. This blind is ideal for maintaining your privacy whilst still allowing plenty of light into the room. Make the most of the varying shades of the light brown by opting for a brown and gold colour scheme in the living room. Blend with luxurious chocolate fabrics and brushed gold features for the ultimate in style and elegance.

relproducts.title: Shine Brown - Day Night Blind
relproducts.description: In a golden bronze, the shine in brown offers a gentle, appealing shimmer that catches the light beautifully. To allow flexible light and privacy, a sheer strip can be moved up and down between the pretty gold fabric, making for practicality as well as style. Use the brown to offset deep chocolate and coffee shades to create a feeling of luxury and opulence in your living room. Choose a gentle mocha tone for two of the walls, leaving those remaining in cream, and furnish with rich brown woods and golden accents.

relproducts.title: Nobis Softshade Walnut Brown Day And Night Blind
relproducts.description: Enjoy optimum light levels whatever youre doing at home with this convenient adjustable window covering. If youre looking for privacy you can enjoy it without completely shutting your blinds with the nobis softshade walnut brown day and night roller blind. The striped design features voile panels to let light in, whilst the brown polyester fabric panels work to shade your windows. Product id: db-vrbx1875 fabric colour: walnut brown material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white brackets control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er1 - lowest energy saving value - due to blind type or fabric light filtering: yes nobis softshade walnut brown day and night blind in brown.

relproducts.title: Hoxton Softshade Roasted Coffee Day And Night Blind
relproducts.description: The hoxton softshade roasted coffee day and night roller blind offers a unique and modern way to control natural light within your home. The design of alternating solid fabric and voile strip panels enables you to increase privacy without completely shutting out natural light. This day and night roller blind features coffee brown fabric strips for a warm and classic feel. Product id: db-vrbx1855 fabric colour: roasted coffee material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white brackets control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er1 - lowest energy saving value - due to blind type or fabric light filtering: yes hoxton softshade roasted coffee day and night blind in brown.

relproducts.title: Origin Cream - Day Night Blind
relproducts.description: The ultimate neutral, the origin's cream is light, airy, and versatile in colour, and sleek and shapely in form. The smooth threads are tightly woven to create a sturdy yet lightweight fabric, and the sliding netting is simple and translucent. Meld the cream with peach and coral tones for an unconventional, yet cheerful and pretty, look in the family bathroom. Choose white walls and peach or coral tiling, accessorising with matching towels, wall art, and trinkets.

relproducts.title: Origin Pewter - Day Night Blind
relproducts.description: The fabric of the slate grey origin pewter is sleek and modern, allowing for a clean and streamlined look and easy workability. The controls and brackets are tucked neatly into the overhead rail cassette, affording the blind extra tidiness and attractiveness. Place the pewter against pure white walls in the living room and add matching grey throws and cushions throughout the room. Choose a bright shade, such as zesty lime, funky satsuma, or cobalt blue, to add bursts of colour throughout the room.

relproducts.title: Origin White - Day Night Blind
relproducts.description: Using sleek, modern threads, the origin white showcases a smooth and pliable, yet strong and sturdy, fabric in an icy lily white. The cloth hosts a sliding strip of white netting that can be raised or lowered depending on your light and privacy needs. Settle the white against a red feature wall in the dining room, pairing with wooden floors and contemporary wooden furniture. Include plenty of reds and whites throughout the room, perhaps in place mats and crockery, to bring the look together.

relproducts.title: Origin Taupe Grey - Day Night Blind
relproducts.description: In a delicate stone shade, the origin taupe grey is subtle and unassuming. Its clean, contemporary fabric has a smooth, touchable texture and is double-layered to home netted strips that can be raised and lowered to allow more or less light into the room. Create an industrial look in a teenager's bedroom by hanging the taupe grey amidst cobalt blue or slate grey walls, perhaps including a brick-look wallpaper for a fun effect.

relproducts.title: Origin Medium Grey - Day Night Blind
relproducts.description: A contemporary shade of grey, the origin's medium grey is sleek and clean with an industrial edge. For complete versatility, the sliding strip of netting can be moved up and down to allow more or less light into the room whilst still retaining privacy. Use the medium grey as part of a strong, moody dcor scheme in an older child's bedroom, framing it with stark white or pale grey walls. Add distinctive metallic furniture, in materials such as steel and wire, to add a real sense of style to the room.

relproducts.title: Origin Black - Day Night Blind
relproducts.description: In sleek ebony, the origin in black is flawlessly chic. The blind comprises of a smooth, contemporary double layering of jet black fabric, which hosts a sliding strip of black striped netting, and an overhead rail cassette containing the controls and brackets. Fuse the black with a sunny yellow for a cool and fashionable look in a teenager's bedroom. Stick to a base of pure white walls, and use a mixture of black and lemon for the bedlinen, wall hangings, and ornaments.

relproducts.title: Origin Mushroom - Vista Blind
relproducts.description: Origin mushroom allows you to control the light and shade in your home with minimal effort, whilst at the same time adding a richly authentic aesthetic that gives every modern decorated home the homely touch. Look closer and you'll see the subtle patterning of the voile as it hangs elegantly in front of the fabric. Beiges, sandy browns, and lightly coloured leathers all work beautifully when placed against origin mushroom.
